edu.duke

Class FileSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.duke.FileSelector

  • class FileSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class creates a thread safe file dialog box for loading and saving files.

      Nested Classes

      (package private) static class  FileSelector.ChooserFilter

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.io.File saveFile()
      Pops up a dialog box to save file with any extension.
      static java.io.File saveFile(java.lang.String[] extensionAccepted)
      Pops up a dialog box to save file with given extensions.
      static java.io.File selectFile()
      Pops up a dialog box to select only one file.
      static java.io.File selectFile(java.lang.String[] extensionAccepted)
      Pops up a dialog box to select only one file with given extensions.
      static java.io.File[] selectFiles()
      Pops up a dialog box to select multiple files.
      static java.io.File[] selectFiles(java.lang.String[] extensionAccepted)
      Pops up a dialog box to select multiple files with given extensions.
